item.name: Authentication
Register a new user and return an access token
Login for Mobile/API Users (Token-based)

request.description: This endpoint logs in users using Laravel Sanctum and returns an access token.

item.name: Logout for Mobile/API Users (Token-based)

request.description: This endpoint revokes the current access token for the authenticated user.

item.name: Caregivers
Validate an invite token (for public use in registration flows)

response.body: {"message":"Failed to validate token.","error":"No query results for model [App\\Models\\Invite]."}

item.name: Invite a user to be your caregiver by email
Accept a caregiver invitation and register if needed
Remove a caregiver-patient relationship
List pending invites sent by the authenticated user
Reorder caregivers by priority
Device Alarms
item.description: Retrieve relevant alarms triggered by devices.

item.name: List relevant device alarms

request.description:
Returns alarms that are either fall or SOS alerts, including basic device and user info,
and a list of caregivers currently en route.

item.name: Show details for a specific device alarm

request.description:
Returns the full details of a specific alarm, including triggered alerts,
device and user information, and the list of caregivers en route.

item.name: Devices
item.description: Endpoints for managing and viewing devices.

item.name: Get all devices accessible to the authenticated user

request.description: Returns devices the user owns (`own`) and devices they access through caregiving relationships (`caregiving`).

item.name: Get devices owned by the authenticated user
Get devices accessible through caregiving relationships
Assign a device to the authenticated user using its phone number
Get a specific device by ID, if user has access
Unassign a device from the authenticated user

variable.description: The ID of the device to unassign.

request.description:
This removes the ownership link between the user and the device.
Only the device owner can perform this action.

item.name: Notes
Get notes for the authenticated user.
Store a new note for the authenticated user.
Update an existing note of the authenticated user.
Delete a note owned by the authenticated user.
Push Notifications
Register or update a push token for the authenticated user.

request.description:
This endpoint is called by the mobile app after receiving a push token from FCM.
It ensures that the token is stored and linked to the current user, allowing them to receive notifications.

item.name: Delete a push token for the authenticated user.

request.description: This is typically called when the user logs out or disables notifications on the device.

item.name: User
item.description: Endpoints for managing the authenticated user's profile, caregivers, and patients.

item.name: Show the authenticated user's information.
Update the authenticated user's profile information.
Update the authenticated user's password.
Delete the authenticated user's account.
Get all caregivers for the authenticated user.
Get all patients the authenticated user cares for.
Update caregiver priorities.
